title: What title do I have?
body: So I've been playing this game for a while now and have come to the forums a couple times and I wanted to know what these titles like "senior" or "recruiter" mean. This is also a test to see what I am!

replies.body: These are old titles from the old forums before we had the boards.  Recruiter was earned through the Refer a Friend system, though, I don't recall what exactly Senior was.  Will have to get Wuks or a volunteer in here to share some history.  Brb.  :P
Senior Member was a title you got for posting enough. There were three "member" titles, Junior Member, Member, and Senior Member, which would change based on the number of posts you made.
